name: Raven Knight Geist
description:
It's nothing special, just a prototype for a 2D platformer I've got in mind. I put this together for LudumDare 45. It's my first time, so the game is pretty basic, but I hope my passion for the project is conveyed clearly!

Controls:

  • Move left and right with the arrow keys
  • Press Z to shoot when you pickup the gun!
